name: Turbo Skid Racing 2 Free
description:
Drift, slide, skid ! 'Turbo Skid Racing 2', the ultimate 3D perspective car racing game, makes racing even tougher than ever.

You choose you car amongst and compete against
Audi R8
Mercedes Benz
AM Vantage
DBS Volante
Lamborghini Gallardo
Bugatti Veyron
Lamborghini Aventador
Ferrari F40
Ford GT40
Ferrari 612
Porsche Carrera
Mustang GT500

As an experienced stunt racer, you will have to manage racing with your car on bumpers and jumps, narrow roads. Don't let you get overtaken by the fast computer driven cars, avoid collisions and win the races!

The game is built on the best vehicle physics engine available for real driving sensations and a very effective computer driven cars artificial intelligence system. It features high definition 3D graphics, along with rock musics and realistic sound fx.
If you like car games, this one is different, this one is for you!
